body_html: A little while ago I added code to python_function.cpp that translates None from backward to zeros. I think it's only happening for "new style" autograd functions that use @staticmethod. We should make it work for these "old style" functions too.
body_text: A little while ago I added code to python_function.cpp that translates None from backward to zeros. I think it's only happening for "new style" autograd functions that use @staticmethod. We should make it work for these "old style" functions too.
body: A little while ago I added code to `python_function.cpp` that translates `None` from backward to zeros. I think it's only happening for "new style" autograd functions that use `@staticmethod`. We should make it work for these "old style" functions too.
